name: jsnetworkx
description: A port of the Python graph library NetworkX to JavaScript

scripts.build:node:dev: rm -rf node/ && node scripts/build-node.js jsnx/ node/
scripts.build:browser: rm jsnetworkx.js && { 6to5-runtime; NODE_ENV=prod browserify -t [./transforms/replace --BUNDLE=jsnetworkx.js] jsnx/browser.js -s jsnx; } | uglifyjs -c -m -o jsnetworkx.js
scripts.build:browser:dev: rm jsnetworkx-dev.js && { 6to5-runtime; browserify -t [./transforms/replace --BUNDLE=jsnetworkx-dev.js] jsnx/browser.js -d -s jsnx; } > jsnetworkx-dev.js
scripts.test: npm run build:node:dev && mocha --ui exports -R progress -r './mocha/setup' `find node/ -name *-test.js`
scripts.cover: npm run build:node && istanbul cover _mocha -x '**/__tests__/**' -x 'mocha/*' -- --ui exports -R progress -r './mocha/setup' `find node/ -name *-test.js`
